testcase.classname: Search Functionality of Google website in chrome browser
testcase.name: Validate search functionality is working on google website
testcase.system-out: Given Launch Browser........................................................passed And User is on google search page...........................................passed When User enters text in search bar.........................................passed And User hits enter.........................................................passed Then User must be navigated to respective search results page...............passed

testcase.name: Check Login is successful with login credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page.................................................passed When user enter username and password.......................................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user is navigated to home page.........................................passed
